EmailTemplate.name: Webinar Series Thank You
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners Webinar Series Sign-up
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=valued participant}},
Thank you for signing up to receive updates on future webinars. We will keep you informed of all upcoming events. You can check back at any time at http://info.mbopartners.com/Webinar.html.
